briefingTitle: What is the latest in code RL environments and human data?

sections.heading: Topline
points: The frontier is moving from code completion to environment-grounded agent training.
Terminal-native data pipelines and verifiable reward systems are becoming core infra.
Human feedback is being re-scoped to long-horizon orchestration, red-team edge cases, and targeted rubric design.

sections.heading: This weekâ€™s strongest signal
points: Nous Research Hermes Agent launch: persistent memory, multi-surface agent operations, explicit RL data-generation orientation.
